title: Harry S Truman National Historic Site: Donate
body: How to Donate       Thank you for your interest in supporting Harry S Truman National Historic Site. Your donation will enhance programs and activities to protect park resources and provide visitor services. Philanthropic contributions continue to make a significant difference and we welcome and are grateful for your support. Your contributions will: help restore, preserve and protect the properties that make up Harry S Truman National Historic Site, enable conservation treatments of the museum collection, aid the park interpretive and education programs, and help maintain park facilities, exhibits, and grounds. Harry S Truman NHS is able to accept direct donations. If you are interested in donating directly to the park you may contact the Superintendent by phone (816-254-2720) or by email. Donations may be sent to: Superintendent Harry S Truman NHS 223 N. Main St. Independence, MO 64050
